import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import { saveApplication } from '../Services/ApplicationService'; const Application = () => { const fileRef = useRef(); const [file, setFile] =useState(undefined); const [values,setValues] = useState({ name: '', email:'', City: '', Age: '', Description: '', Gender: '', }); const onChange = (event) => { setValues({...values,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } const handleNewApplication = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); try{ const response = await saveApplication(values); } catch(error) { console.log(error); } } return (
Gender
) } export default Application
